attributes.action: uk visa change.s  regarding the right to love and happiness
attributes.additional_details:
i see the existing system  has got real decrimination
by decriminating people on low income.s  or on benefits  from bringing there partner.s to live reside in the uk   as  its every man or womans rights to love and happiness   to be together and not seperated
as it a basic human right to everyone right to be happy the happiness the love being a couple a family being  together , this law in place now is unjustly a violation of civil  liberties  human right  , the right to the love happiness  we all deserve  make a fair equal system for uk visa for uk  citizens  of who meet there love,s abroad  and give those on low incomes and on benefits there right to bringing there partners  children to the uk   with requirements of they are in a real relationship   and   wants to support there self with  working .  its decrimination under the existing system   ,  as i know this system in place now enfringes  on my basic human rights totally to the the rights to love and happiness
